refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert Docbook to POD using xsltproc, groff and polyglot rman utilities

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This module provides methods to convert Docbook XML to POD and to merge that POD into a Perl document.

refsection.title: Background
refsection.para: This modules allows module documentation to be written as Docbook refentry articles and then converted to POD - and optionally merged into the module they are documenting. This allows for the use of Docbook editors to maintain documentation as separate entities if desired.
